subject: Horse Racing
lead_paragraph: A jumps race at Tramore in southeast Ireland on Monday ended in farce with nine of the jockeys being barred for five days. All 14 riders left the course before completing the final lap. Five eventually realized their mistake and finished. The jockey Andrew McNamara won the race on Mr Aussie by six lengths. The jockeys were penalized for not giving their mounts the best finish possible.
